text:
Qumulo | Software Engineer | Vancouver Canada | Full-time Onsite

We're looking for talented systems software engineers to join our growing Vancouver development team and help build the world's most advanced filesystem, Qumulo File Fabric (QF2). QF2 is a modern, highly scalable file storage system that runs in the data center and the public cloud.

For more info or to apply: https://qumulo.com/company/jobs/
